```
spring:
  cloud:
    gateway:
      routes:
        - id: greeting-service
          uri: http://localhost:3001/
          predicates:
            - Path=/**
          filters:
          - RewritePath=/?(?<segment>.*), /$\{segment} 
```

```
apiVersion: dapr.io/v1alpha1
kind: Configuration
metadata:
  name: daprConfig
spec: {} 
```

```
spring:
  cloud:
    gateway:
      routes:
        - id: greeting-service
          uri: http://localhost:4000/
          predicates:
            - Path=/**
          filters:
          - RewritePath=//?(?<segment>.*), /v1.0/invoke/greeting/method/$\{segment} 
```

```
apiVersion: dapr.io/v1alpha1
kind: Configuration
metadata:
  name: daprConfig
spec:
  nameResolution:
    component: "consul"
    configuration:
      selfRegister: true
```

```
apiVersion: dapr.io/v1alpha1
kind: Configuration
metadata:
  name: daprConfig
spec:
  nameResolution:
    component: "consul"
    configuration:
      selfRegister: true
  tracing:
    samplingRate: "1"
    zipkin:
      endpointAddress: "http://localhost:9411/api/v2/spans" 
```
